description:
Polnareff revives his sister using one of the wishes he received, but then is attacked by her. The enemy stand user, Cameo says he`ll grant his other wish, and revives Avdol. The revived Shelly and Avdol then try to eat Polnareff alive. Polnareff tries to fight back with his Stand, but starts to lose consciousness and then...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 審判[ジャッジメント] その2
